attributes.action: No tax on key workers extra pay during Covid 19 crisis period.
attributes.additional_details: Apply a period of tax free earnings on key workers extra pay during the Covid 19 crisis period. Key workers are working hard to keep the country in food and essentials during this time and should be rewarded with all the money they earned while everyone else gets paid time off work. These people are putting thier health at risk for the community.
attributes.background: Apply a period of tax free earnings on key workers extra pay during the Covid 19 crisis period. Key workers are working hard to keep the country in food and essentials during this time and should be rewarded with all the money they earned while everyone else gets paid time off work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
